lines.text: I was getting to where I could see the truth. Someday I'll be brave enough to speak it.
He died. In a fire. ...I got out in time. ...But he didn't. ...So dawn goes down to day... Nothing gold can stay.
I dunno why I bother goin' to school anyway, 'cept there's nothin' better to do. Might as well dissect a frog.
This is my brother Soda and my other brother Darry. We take turns cooking.
No we don't. Pony starts dinner, wanders off, and it burns to a crisp. We take turns doing the dishes.
